Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained tissue sections on positively charged slides
Purpose: To detect the presence of NUT protein in tissue samples, aiding in the diagnosis of NUT midline carcinoma and related conditions.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, incubator, automated immunostainer (or manual staining setup)
